titleStmt.title: Morbus epidemicus, or The churles sickenesse In a sermon preached before the iudges of the assises. By T.P.
titleStmt.author: Pestell, Thomas, 1584?-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Thomas Creede for Arthur Iohnson, and are to bee solde at his shoppe in Paules Churchyard, at the White Horse, neere the great north dore of Powles,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The churles sicknesse.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Paules Churchyard, at the White Horse, neere the great north dore of Powles
